Frequently Asked Questions

Everything you need to know about joining our exclusive professional community

‚Üê Back to Home

How much does it cost?

The community is completely free. We believe in the power of mutual value exchange rather than monetary transactions.

What makes someone qualified?

We look for professionals with deep domain expertise, proven track records, and a genuine desire to help others succeed.

How active is the community?

Members typically respond within 24 hours. Quality conversations happen daily across multiple domains and specialties.

What happens after approval?

You'll receive an invitation to our private community platform with guidelines, introductions, and access to ongoing discussions.

Can I promote my services?

No. This is a peer support community, not a marketplace. Promotional content results in immediate removal.

How do you maintain quality?

Through careful vetting, active moderation, and a culture that prioritizes helpful, actionable contributions over self-promotion.

What domains are represented?

Our community spans product, engineering, marketing, growth, finance, operations, and leadership across various industries.

How long does the application process take?

We review applications weekly and typically respond within 3-5 business days with our decision.

What if I'm not accepted?

We provide brief feedback and encourage reapplication after gaining more experience or expertise in your domain.

Is there a time commitment?

No mandatory time commitment. Participate when you have questions, insights to share, or time to help others.

What platforms do you use?

We use a private, modern community platform designed for professional discussions and knowledge sharing.

Can I leave the community?

Absolutely. You can leave at any time, though we'd love to understand your reasons to improve the experience.

Ready to connect with exceptional professionals?

Applications are reviewed weekly. We maintain excellence by remaining highly selective.

Apply to Join

Application takes 5 minutes. Decisions communicated within 3 business days.
